articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction after the weekend's action as Ruben Amorim's Man Utd era begins with a draw & Liverpool win to go clear.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Man Utd draw Amorim's first match & Liverpool go clear at top

articles.description: India complete a stunning 295-run win over Australia in the first Test in Perth to continue their extraordinary run in the country.
articles.title: India beat Australia by 295 runs in first Test in Perth

articles.description: How can Liverpool allow superstar Salah to leave as his incredible numbers inspire title challenge?
articles.title: Southampton 2-3 Liverpool: How can Reds allow superstar Mohamed Salah to leave?

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs win on the last kick of the game to go 10-1 for the season, while the Dallas Cowboys end a five-game losing streak after a wild finish.
articles.title: NFL results & week 12 recap: Kansas City Chiefs go 10-1 and Dallas Cowboys win thriller

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim expects his side to suffer for a long time after seeing them start his management era with draw at Ipswich.
articles.title: Ipswich Town 1-1 Man Utd: Why Ruben Amorim expects side to suffer for long period

articles.description: Max Verstappen is recognised as one of the all-time greats of F1 and demonstrated why by maximising his results during 2024, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: Max Verstappen wins world title: Why his 'almost flawless' season is 'towering achievement'

articles.description: England captain Jamie George says his side are "in a very good place" after ending their autumn campaign by thrashing Japan.
articles.title: Jamie George: 'England in a very good place', says captain

articles.description: Leicester City wanted Steve Cooper to succeed - but felt they could not afford to fail, writes BBC Sport's Nick Mashiter.
articles.title: Steve Cooper: Why Leicester City boss was sacked five months into reign

articles.description: Scotland head coach Gregor Townsend is left frustrated by aspects of his side's performance in their 27-13 Autumn Nations Series win over Australia, but praises the way his players "found a way to win".
articles.title: Autumn Nations Series: Scotland 'found a way to win' against Australia, says head coach Gregor Townsend

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe and Jude Bellingham were on target as Real Madrid beat Leganes to close gap on Barcelona in La Liga.
articles.title: Leganés 0-3 Real Madrid: Kylian Mbappe and Jude Bellingham score as visitors close gap on Barca
